description:
As the night wears on, the party heats up. Banri and Linda run into each other and burst out laughing when they see how the other is dressed. When the guests ask to take their picture, they put their arms around each other`s shoulders and strike various poses, feeling elated amidst the flashes. Suddenly, before them appears...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドント・ルックバック
